articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Flayed for Taking Lead in Adoption of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Flayed for Taking Lead in Adoption of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Saturday issued information bulletin No. 1080 condemning the south Korean puppet regime for joining those states which co-sponsored the railroading of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the UN session.
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 It is the south Korean puppet regime which cried out for the adoption of the "resolution" with the information full of lies, fabrications and plots, while begging for the cooperation for the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign. It is also the regime which, not content with arranging interview of human scum by riff raffs of the international community in south Korea, let them present "testimonies" in the international arenas.
					
					  The puppet group took the lead in fabricating the "human rights resolution", pursuant to the U.S. It is aimed to defame the high authority and influence of the DPRK, justify the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and divert public opinion elsewhere in a bid to put the people's mindset under control, calm down the spirit of the south Korean people's anti-"government" struggle and thus tide over the ruling crisis.
					
					 The puppet forces are the top-class sycophants and traitors without an equal in the world who leave south Korea to the tender mercy of the U.S. as its colony and offer even the military prerogative to foreign forces, and the biggest human rights abuser who turned south Korea into a tundra of human rights. It is, therefore, nonsensical for them to talk about someone's "human rights".
					
					 It is a ridiculous daydream to try to use "human rights" racket for bringing down Korean socialism that displays its might by dint of Songun and wins victory after victory by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group actively joined the U.S. manipulation of the provocative "human rights resolution" against the DPRK while kowtowing to the U.S. This is little short of a declaration of an all-out war against the social system and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will neither remain a passive onlooker to the puppet forces' "human rights" racket nor pardon anyone who provokes its dignity, social system and people even a bit with the "human rights" as a pretext.
					
					 All Koreans and the international community should see through the despicable nature and sinister scheme of the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean puppet group and categorically reject it.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for Malaysia
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for Malaysia
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) headed by Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, left here on Saturday for Malaysia to participate in the Congress of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia.

articles.title: State Commendations Awarded to Merited Service Personnel
articles.content:
State Commendations Awarded to Merited Service Personnel 
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to service personnel who performed labor feats in the construction of apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Yonphung Scientists Rest Home and Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage in the DPR of Korea. 
					 Order of Kim Il Sung went to one person, the title of Labor Hero to three, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize to one, Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to one, the title of Builder of Merit to one, the title of Driver of Merit to one, Order of National Flag First Class to eight, Order of Labor to four, Order of National Flag Second Class to 124, Order of National Flag Third Class to 350 and Distinguished Military Service Medal to 947.
					
					 The above-said structures which appeared as monumental edifices in the era of Songun are crystal of the profound loving care shown by supreme leader Kim Jong Un as they are a shining embodiment of his idea of attaching importance to education and talents and his love of the children and future. 
					
					 Soldier-builders completed the huge construction projects in a short span of time at the highest level by waging a high-pitched drive day and night in the spirit of at one go and thus fully demonstrated once again the architecture and advantages of Korean-style socialism. 
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding commendations was promulgated on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Judoka Wins Gold Medal in Judo Grand Prix, Qingdao 2014
articles.content:
DPRK Judoka Wins Gold Medal in Judo Grand Prix, Qingdao 2014
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK judoka Sol Kyong came first in the women's 78 kg category event of the Judo Grand Prix, Qingdao 2014.
					 She beat her Chinese rival with wazari in the preliminaries, defeated her German rival with decision in the semi-finals and trounced her Dutch rival with ippon in the finals, grabbing a gold medal.

articles.title: Power Grid Control Information System Developed
articles.content:
Power Grid Control Information System Developed
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Global Environmental Information Institute under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences has recently developed an aid information system for control over power grid on the basis of GIS (geographical information system) technology.
					 The newly-developed system, suited to local conditions, makes it possible to establish the power grid on a more rational way and ensure its operation on a scientific basis, reducing the electrical power line loss as much as possible.
					
					 It helps make the most rational layout of transmission towers or power poles without on-site survey and monitor in real time the operation of electric power system.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- At least 848 400 service personnel and people from all walks of life and school youth and children of more than 6 200 units visited the Susan-ri House of Class Education in Kangso District, Nampho City in the past four years since its opening.
					 Displayed there are many evidence and data laying bare the hair-raising massacre committed by the U.S. imperialists and class enemies during the strategic temporary retreat during the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The visitors keenly realized the immutable truth that illusion about the enemy precisely means death and its aggressive and man-killing nature remains unchanged no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.

articles.title: "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 24 Off Press
articles.content:
"Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 24 Off Press
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 24 was brought out in the DPRK. It comprehensively deals with famous works of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The book carries 48 works authored by him from January, Juche 98 (2009) to February, Juche 99 (2010).
					
					 The works indicate the outstanding ideas, theories and policies which would serve as the guidelines for the struggle to dynamically push ahead with the building of a thriving socialist nation under the unfurled banner of Songun.
					
					 In his works he clarified the important guidelines to give fullest play to the inexhaustible mental power of the popular masses to bring about historic great innovations and leap forward and thus effect a new turn in socialist construction.
					
					 In other works he underlined the need to follow the noble example set by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk, dynamically advance to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and firmly defend, carry forward and develop the revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He indicated the tasks and ways for effecting a great surge in the production of different fields including the vanguard domains of the national economy and the tasks to break through the cutting edge in economy and science and technology and build an economic power and a scientific and technological power by further intensifying the drive for the industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					 He also clarified issues of bringing about a decisive turn in improving the standard of people's living and focusing forces of the whole party and state on this work, the theoretical and practical issues arising in developing the educational work of the country and stressed the need for the officials to decisively improve their cultural level.
					
					 The book also contains works dealing with the idea of creating more literary and art works conducive to the revolutionary education and class education, the issue of building well the recreation grounds and steadily improving their operation and the issue of positively conducting the work to turn the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays U.S. and Its Servants for Adopting Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays U.S. and Its Servants for Adopting Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-manipulated railroading of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the UN is the most striking manifestation of the hostile policy toward the DPRK to bring down the man-centered socialist system which the Korean people chose themselves and consider dearer than their own lives, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 Choosing a social system is entirely a matter pertaining to a sovereign right of the people of a relevant country, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 No country has the right to intervene in the internal affairs of other country. It is the people of the country who are well aware of its specific conditions and what they like precisely means a human rights standard.
					
					 The "resolution" on the "human rights situation" submitted by the allies of the U.S. has no relevance with the genuine promotion of the human rights protection as it is a product of the anti-DPRK plot. 
					
					 The U.S. kicked off the "human rights offensive" against the DPRK in real earnest in the UN arena in a bid to invent a pretext for starting an invasion by creating the impression that the country is a "tundra of human rights."
					
					 History tells that the U.S. baseless "human rights" racket ends in an invasion in the long run.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is now inching close to a phase of extreme tensions because of the railroading of the "resolution" manipulated by the U.S. and other hostile forces and its allies.
					
					 It is crystal clear that under the prevailing situation, the war deterrence of the DPRK will be bolstered up unlimitedly to cope with the U.S. invasion of the country.
					
					 The U.S., the principal architect of the "resolution", and its servants will be held wholly responsible for all the consequences to be entailed by its adoption.

articles.title: U.S. "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK Peppered with Fabrications: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK Peppered with Fabrications: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The "human rights resolution" against the DPRK which was railroaded through the United Nations recently is a conspiratorial document based on lies and fabrications seriously distorting and misrepresenting the beautiful reality of the DPRK and noble ideological feelings of its army and people toward their social system, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary.
					 The U.S. is an old hand at plot-breeding and intrigue. It was none other than the U.S. which worked out the "resolution", let EU countries and Japan act a main player in submitting and railroading it through the UN General Assembly and persistently pressurized and appeased other countries to vote for it, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Major information used in the "resolution" was nothing but "testimonies" made by a handful of "defectors from the north" who fled the DPRK after committing crimes or were lured.
					
					 The U.S. and other Western countries are describing such human scum's "testimonies" as truth. These human scum are malignantly hurting the dignified DPRK with sheer lies to prolong their dirty remaining days.
					
					 As already known, some human scum, blinded by money-making, are providing even false documents bearing forged official seals of major departments and organs of the DPRK.
					
					 These facts go to clearly prove that the "resolution" is a criminal document faked up by the U.S. to violate the national sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The "resolution" is a revelation of the U.S. plot to invade the DPRK under the pretext of the human rights issue.
					
					 The U.S. compels the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence. The U.S. will be held wholly responsible for all consequences to be entailed in the future.

articles.title: DPRK Will Take All Steps without Limit to Finally Settle Accounts with U.S.: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Will Take All Steps without Limit to Finally Settle Accounts with U.S.: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently sought the carriage of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the UN General Assembly, fully revealing that it is working hard to carry out its criminal scenario for bringing down the socialist system of the DPRK, bereft of any reason and face, says Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary.
					 What is more ridiculous is that not a few countries which voted for the "resolution" admitted their awkward position that they reluctantly voted for it not because they were concerned about the human rights situation in the DPRK but because the U.S. and Japan threatened them to halt economic aid, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Justice, truth and impartiality are completely ignored at the UN called sacred and political swindles are practiced for a petty amount of money. This is a tragedy of the 21st century which the international community cannot but deplore.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in kicking up the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is to escalate "human rights" offensive against the DPRK in the international arena in a bid to tarnish its image and invent a pretext for stifling it by force of arms.
					
					 It is needless to say that the U.S. will launch an intensive sudden military provocation under the pretext for settling the nuclear issue and the "human rights issue".
					
					 Under the situation where the U.S. is brandishing a sword for all-out confrontation with the DPRK, the latter is compelled to take all necessary unlimited steps to cope with the worst event to finally settle accounts with the brigandish U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career and Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career and Feats
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The sacred revolutionary career of leader Kim Jong Il was one of profound love and dedication in which he carved out the future of the country and its people with his ardent enthusiasm and warm heart, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The article notes:
					
					 Firmly determined to be responsible not only for the present-day of the country and nation but for the eternal future from the very day he embarked upon the road of revolutionary leadership, he dedicated himself to the future of the country and the happiness of the generations to come.
					
					 When he was shaping lines and policies, undertaking any work and taking any interests into consideration, he gave priority to the future of the country, always foreseeing dozens nay hundreds of years ahead.
					
					 Saying that one should do a lot of work for the country and its people, counting every minute and second, he ardently hoped one second would be one hour. He was on field guidance on Sundays, holidays and even on his birthdays.
					
					 He devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country solely, sacrificing his all after refusing to enjoy the rights all people do.
					
					 There was nothing left for himself. He dedicated his noble life to the eternal future of the country and nation.
					
					 The beaming image of Kim Jong Il, the benefactor of the nation and peerless patriot, will always be remembered by the Korean people and posterity as the image of the great Paektusan nation in which they will enjoy highest dignity and greatest happiness thanks to his feats.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Egypt
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was brought out in booklet by the Nath Publishing House of Egypt on Nov. 17.
					 The work, published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and absurdity of sophistry let loose by the imperialists and renegades of socialism slandering socialism as "totalitarian", "barrack-like" and "administrative and commanding".
					
					 It also clarifies the principled issues arising in defending the cause of socialism and accomplishing it such as the issues of regarding socialism as faith, putting it on a moral basis and giving full play to its advantages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 13.
					 The chairman of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary life and undying feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Introduces Korean Women
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Introduces Korean Women
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Korean women yesterday and today" on its website on Nov. 13.
					 The article introduced in detail the promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality which codifies that the Korean women have equal rights with men in all fabrics of political, economic and cultural life thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung. It went on:
					
					 This was a historic event which put an end to the unfortunate fate of the Korean women that had lasted for centuries. It was not until then that the Korean women enjoyed the equal rights with men as full-fledged mistresses of the country and society.
					
					 The position of the Korean women was put on a higher stage thanks to HE Kim Jong Il, the great successor to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published famous works including the work "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction", putting the dignity of the women onto the highest level and making sure that the social trait of respecting the women prevailed throughout the country.
					
					 Thanks to his deep attention and state policies many Korean women could enjoy a dignified and proud life as patriots, heroes and pace-setters in the era.
					
					 The dignity and pride of the Korean women have been put on a high phase thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He organizes national events on each March 8 International Women's Day, congratulating women.
					
					 He saw to it that November 16 was instituted as Mother's Day, adding to the pride of the women.
					
					 He made sure that a new hostel was built to provide the women of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill with better living conditions.

articles.title: British Organizations Flail S. Korean Authorities' War Maneuvers against DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Flail S. Korean Authorities' War Maneuvers against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on Nov. 9 denouncing the south Korean puppet group for staging the war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that involved in provocative Hoguk drills which kicked off on Nov. 10 are at least 330 000 troops including the three services of the puppet army and marine corps, and U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					
					 Detente is urgently needed on the Korean Peninsula at present and to this end the south Korean puppet clique should halt hostile acts against the DPRK, it held, and continued:
					
					 Hoguk drills assume the danger of spilling over into an all-out war from military clashes.
					
					 If the south Korean puppet clique truly wants peace and reunification, it should stop the military exercises at once.
					
					 Hoguk is aimed to bring down Korean-style socialism and the only beacon of socialism in the world by force of arms and eliminate the world anti-imperialist independent forces.
					
					 All adherents to the Juche idea and the Songun idea and the world progressives will stand by the DPRK.

articles.title: No toleraremos a los ofensores a dignidad, destaca CRPP
articles.content:
No toleraremos a los ofensores a  dignidad, destaca CRPP
						
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Para condenar a la banda titere del Sur de Corea que presentandose como "pais co-proponente", se entrego a la fabricacion de la "resolucion de DDHH" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 22 una informacion no.1080.
					Los titeres surcoreanos, al mendigar la cooperacion en el sector de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, incitaron la fabricacion de la "resolucion de DDHH" con los datos llenos de fraude, falsificacion e intrigas, invitaron a la morralla de la sociedad internacional al Sur de Corea para que se reunieran con las escorias humanas e hicieron que ellas hagan "testimonio" hasta en la escena internacional.
					
					Asi recuerda el documento y continua:
					
					El presente comportamiento de los titeres surcoreanos es para manchar el alto prestigio y la influencia de la RPDC, justificar sus maniobras conflictivas, desviar la opinion publica a fin de calmar a los habitantes y desanimar la lucha "anti-gobierno" de los habitantes surcoreanos y de esta manera salir de la crisis de dominacion.
					
					Es ilogico que hablen de "DDHH" de alguien los violadores de DDHH quienes entregaron a EE.UU. el territorio surcoreano como colonia de este imperio y hasta la autoridad de mando militar y convirtieron el Sur de Corea en el infierno de DDHH.
					
					Es absurda la intencion de la banda titere surcoreana de atentar con tal campana contra nuestro socialismo que ostenta su aspecto majestuoso con el Songun y marcha victoriosamente con la unidad monolitica. Esa intencion no se realizara nunca aunque pasen mil anos.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos se sumaron a la aprobacion de la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC en contubernio con el imperio, lo que significa la declaracion de guerra total contra nuestro regimen y nuestro pueblo.
					
					No estaremos con brazos cruzados ante la campana de "DDHH" de la banda titere del Sur de Corea ni perdonaremos jamas a quienes se atrevan a danar nuestra dignidad, regimen y pueblo, bajo el pretexto de "DDHH".
					
					Todos los coreanos y la sociedad internacional deberan rechazar categoricamente la siniestra intencion y el sucio complot que hay detras de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: Condecorados constructores militares ameritados
articles.content:
Condecorados constructores militares ameritados
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Fueron condecorados en Corea los constructores militares quienes realizaron proezas laborales en la construccion de las viviendas de educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Casa de Reposo para Cientificos Yonphung y el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang.
					La Orden Kim Il Sung fue concedida a Kim Jin Gun; el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo a Jong Kyong Jun, Kim Jun Sop y Ri Ku Bom; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung a Ri Kum Song; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il a Pak Yun Chol, respectivamente.
					
					El titulo de Constructor Benemerito fue conferida a una persona; el de Chofer Benemerito a otra persona; la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a 8; la Orden del Trabajo a 4; la Orden Bandera Nacional de segunda clase a 124; la misma orden de tercera clase a 350; la Medalla del Merito Militar a 947.
					
					Los constructores militares demostraron otra vez a todo el mundo la arquitectura de la epoca del Songun en constante desarrollo y la superioridad del socialismo al estilo coreano al terminar las construcciones arriba mencionadas en el nivel supremo y en un corto tiempo trabajando de dia y noche.
					
					Se ha publicado el dia 20 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
